title: The Beginning of the Mystical Age with Vin Armani
description:
Someone pointed me to the episode on the @Unregistered Podcast with Vin Armani where he spoke about Jordan Peterson. I mentioned this in a video and he contacted me to make sure I didn't have the wrong idea based on that talk. We struck up an email correspondence and I asked if he'd be willing to share his story. It's quite a story and he's got a very interesting perspective on the world. Here it is. 

Vin Armani on the Unregistered Podcast https://youtu.be/O3mVLXyFUtc
Vin Armani interviewing @Jordan B Peterson https://youtu.be/Wjk4sCLG8n8

Discord Link https://discord.gg/gcMuVAzs

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
